name: Cobalt-B
info:
Appeared as a very serious, by-the-book scientist, but actually a flexible anti-stereotype.
Hardly shows any expression as if he had no facial muscles. But one can obviously tell he is not aloof after getting to know him, with many emotions and thoughts of his own, such as puffing his cheeks out when he's angry.
Despite being a leading scientist in the development of cybernetics, he often goes by instinct rather than logic.
Relies on strong intuitions to modify machines, though not above adding completely useless attachments just for preference.
description:
Cobalt-B, which is not her real name, is a mechanical engineer on the Hykros weapon development team. Her position isn't too high up on the corporate ladder, because her test results aren't very good.
Only the people that she works with know that she is, in fact, the ace of the entire team. She doesn't care about basic theories, and only creates extremely effective weapons based on her instinct.
To test these weapons and collect combat data, she occasionally goes on operations with other soldiers and tries her weapons on poor Hyena members.

skills.name: Normal Attack
skills.description: On the ground, tap normal attack button to launch 5 attacks in a row. The first attack deals 52.3% of ATK + 3 damage. The second attack deals 75.6% of ATK + 4 damage. The third attack deals 94.5% x ATK + 5 damage. The fourth attack deals 142.8% of ATK + 8 damage. The fifth attack deals 137.8% of ATK + 7 damage.

skills.name: Charged Shot
skills.description: Hold attack button to charge the attack, then release to fire rounds dealing 95.4% of ATK + 5 damage, plus explosion three seconds later (or if the target dies), dealing 23.9% x ATK damage to nearby enemies, with AOE doubling each time (up to 4 times) a target in the area is dealt damage, plus increased damage.

skills.name: Jumping Blast
skills.description: While airborne or after jumping once, use an ariel attack to trigger Jumping Blast. Toss a bomb that deals damage equal to 90.8% of ATK + 5 to enemies in a circle ahead, knocking them back a certain distance and consume 250 endurance.

skills.name: Aerial Discharge
skills.description: Launch Jumping Blast after double jumping. Fire an Omnium beam downward. The beam then sweeps forward, dealing damage equal to 33.8% of ATK + 2.

skills.name: Heavy Bombardment
skills.description: Hold attack button during a normal attack to unleash Suppressing Fire in front, and deal enemies 102% of ATK + 5 AOE damage.

skills.name: Close Quarters
skills.description: Use normal attack right after dodging to trigger Close Quarters. Deal damage equal to 156.1% of ATK + 8 to targets in a frontal cone area.

skills.name: Barrage
skills.description: Constant fire in a forward cone area to deal 666% of ATK + 35damage. Cooldown: 60 seconds.

skills.name: Explosive Rain
skills.description: When weapon charge is full or Phantasia is triggered, switching to this weapon from another weapon removes all debuffs from the wielder, and unleashes 3 grenades forward, dealing 570% of ATK + 30 AOE damage in all and causing launch.

weapon_type.name: Flame
weapon_type.description: Fully charged weapons will set the target on fire for 8 seconds with the next attack, causing ongoing damage of 58% of ATK every second. Ignited targets receive 50% efficacy from healing.

weapon_resonance.name: Flame Resonance
weapon_resonance.description: Flame Resonance: Increase flame ATK by 15% and flame resistance by 25%. Activate by equipping 2 or more flame weapons. This set effect also works with weapons in the off-hand slot. This effect does not stack.

advancement: Each round of attacks deals additional damage equal to 2% of the target's current HP (cannot exceed 200% of ATK).
Increase the current weapon's base ATK growth by 16%.
Heavy Bombardment, Dodge Attack, and Close Quarters inflict Ion Scorch on targets that are already burned, dealing flame damage equal to 60% of their current ATK every second for 10 seconds.
Increase the current weapon's base ATK growth by 32%.
The damage from Ion Scorch increases to 90% of ATK. Successful attacks with any weapon's dodge skills will refresh the duration of Ion Scorch.
Barrage inflicts burn for 15 seconds. Successful attacks with any weapon's dodge skills reduce the cooldown of Barrage by 4 seconds. This effect has a 1.5-second cooldown.

traits.name: Lingering Warmth
traits.description: Upon using a discharge skill, Cobalt-B restores a random amount of weapon charge between 50 and 120 points.

traits.name: Sparks
traits.description: Upon using a discharge skill, Cobalt-B restores a random amount of weapon charge between 90 and 180 points.
